title: Why isn't CoC based on bonus hp
body: So the full damage Vi Lee Riven Renekton etc aren't allowed to abuse it.

replies.body: They intentionally wanted it to be usable without investing into tank items.  They're fine with even Riven using it.  They've said that they're going to tune it down though (there are already nerfs on the pbe).
Colossus is not meant for tanks, it is meant for engage champions as a whole.

It's meant to be used for anyone with engage IMO. So it's strong on divers and vanguards.
